Title: City of Angels?
Writer: Tom Kapinos (developed by), Jason Ning, Jenn Kao, Mike Costa (story editor), Chris Rafferty (story editor), Neil Gaiman (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on characters created by: for Vertigo)

Plot: A flashback episode about Lucifer's first days on Earth.
